Verses: 1 avargal Erusalemukku Sameebamaai Serndhu, Olivamalaikku Arugaana Pedhpage Beththaaniyaa Ennum Oorgalukku Vandhapodhu, Avar Thammudaiya Seesharil Iranduperai Nokki:

2 ungalukku Edhireyirukkira Giraamaththukkup Pongal; Adhil Piravesiththavudane, Manushar Oruvarum Orukkaalum Eriyiraadha Oru Kazhudhaikkutti Kattiyirukkak Kaanpeergal, Adhai Avizhththuk Konduvaarungal.
3 en Ippadichseygireergal Endru Oruvan Ungalidaththil Kettaal: Idhu Aandavarukku Vendumendru Sollungal; Udane Adhai Ivvidaththirku Anuppividuvaan Endru Solli, Avargalai Anuppinaar.
4 avargal Poi, Veliye Iruvazhichsandhiyil Oru Vaasalaruge Kattiyirundha Andhak Kuttiyaikkandu, Adhai Avizhththaargal.
5 appozhudhu Ange Nindravargalil Silar: Neengal Kuttiyai Avizhkkiradhu Ennavendraargal.
6 yesu Karpiththapadiye Avargalukku Uththaravu Sonnaargal. Appozhudhu Avargalaip Pogavittaargal.
7 avargal Andhak Kuttiyai Yesuvinidaththil Konduvandhu, Adhin Mel Thangal Vasthirangalaip Pottaargal; Avar Adhinmel Eripponaar.
8 anegar Thangal Vasthirangalai Vazhiyile Viriththaargal; Veru Silar Marakkilaigalaith Thariththu Vazhiyile Parappinaargal.
9 munnadappaarum, Pinnadappaarum: Osannaa! Karththarin Naamaththinaale Varugiravar Sthoththirikkappattavar,
10 karththarin Naamaththinaale Varugira Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Thaaveedhin Raajyam Aaseervadhikkappaduvadhaaga; Unnadhaththile Osannaa Endru Solli Aarppariththaargal.
11 appozhudhu, Yesu Erusalemukku Vandhu, Dhevaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Ellaavatraiyum Sutrippaarththu: Saayangaalamaanapodhu, Panniruvarodunkoodap Beththaaniyaavukkup Ponaar.
12 marunaalile Avargal Beththaaniyaavilirundhu Purappattuvarugaiyil, Avarukkup Pasiyundaayitru.

13 appozhudhu Ilaigalulla Oru Aththimaraththaith Dhooraththile Kandu, Adhil Edhaagilum Agappadumo Endru Paarkkavandhaar. Aththippazhakkaalamaayiraadhapadiyaal, Avar Adhinidaththil Vandhapodhu Ilaigalaiyallaamal, Verondraiyum Kaanavillai.
14 appozhudhu Yesu Adhaippaarththu: Idhumudhal Orukkaalum Oruvanum Unnidaththil Kaniyaip Pusiyaadhirukkadavan Endraar; Adhai Avarudaiya Seeshargal Kettaargal.

15 avargal Erusalemukku Vandhaargal. Yesu Dhevaalayaththil Piravesiththu, Aalayaththil Virkiravargalaiyum Kollugiravargalaiyum Thuraththivittu, Kaasukkaararudaiya Palagaigalaiyum, Puraa Virkiravargaludaiya Aasanangalaiyum Kavizhththu,
16 oruvanum Dhevaalayaththin Vazhiyaaga Yaadhoru Pandaththaiyum Kondupogavidaamal:
17 ennudaiya Veedu Ellaa Janangalukkum Jebaveedu Ennappadum Endru Ezhudhiyirukkavillaiyaa? Neengalo Adhaik Kallar Kugaiyaakkineergal Endru Avargalukku Solli Ubadhesiththaar.

18 adhai Vedhapaaragarum Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Kettu, Avaraik Kolai Seyya Vagaithedinaargal; Aagilum Janangalellaarum Avarudaiya Ubadhesaththaikkuriththu Aachchariyappattapadiyinaale Avarukkup Bayandhirundhaargal.
19 saayangaalamaanapodhu, Avar Nagaraththilirundhu Purappattupponaar.
20 marunaal Kaalaiyile Avargal Avvazhiyaaip Pogumpodhu, Andha Aththimaram Verode Pattuppoyirukkiradhaik Kandaargal.
21 pedhuru Ninaivukoorndhu, Avarai Nokki: Rabee, Idho, Neer Sabiththa Aththimaram Pattuppoyitru Endraan.
22 yesu Avargalai Nokki: Dhevanidaththil Visuvaasamullavargalaayirungal.

23 evanaagilum Indha Malaiyaip Paarththu: Nee Peyarndhu, Samuththiraththile Thallundupo Endru Solli, Thaan Sonnapadiye Nadakkum Endru Than Irudhayaththil Sandhegappadaamal Visuvaasiththaal, Avan Sonnapadiye Aagum Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.
24 aadhalaal, Neengal Jebampannumpodhu Evaigalaik Kettukkolveergalo, Avaigalaip Petrukolvom Endru Visuvaasiyungal, Appozhudhu Avaigal Ungalukku Undaagum Endru Sollugiren.

25 neengal Nindru Jebampannumpodhu, Oruvanperil Ungalukku Yaadhoru Kurai Undaayirukkumaanaal, Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaa Ungal Thappidhangalai Ungalukku Mannikkumpadi, Andhak Kuraiyai Avanukku Manniyungal.
26 neengal Manniyaadhiruppeergalaanaal, Paralogaththilirukkira Ungal Pidhaavum Ungal Thappidhangalai Manniyaadhiruppaar Endraar.
27 avargal Marupadiyum Erusalemukku Vandhaargal. Avar Dhevaalayaththile Ulaavikkondirukkaiyil, Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Moopparum Avaridaththil Vandhu:
28 neer Endha Adhigaaraththinaal Ivaigalai Seygireer? Ivaigalai Seygiradharku Adhigaaraththai Umakkuk Koduththavar Yaar? Endru Kettaargal.

29 yesu Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Naanum Ungalidaththil Oru Kaariyaththaik Ketkiren, Neengal Enakku Uththaravu Sollungal, Appozhudhu Naanum Inna Adhigaaraththinaale Ivaigalai Seygirenendru Ungalukku Solluven.
30 yovaan Koduththa Snaanam Dhevanaal Undaayitro, Manusharaal Undaayitro, Enakku Uththaravu Sollungal Endraar.
31 adharku Avargal: Dhevanaal Undaayitrendru Solvomaanaal, Pinnae En Avanai Visuvaasikkavillaiyendru Ketpaar;
32 manusharaal Undaayitrendru Solvomaanaal, Janangalukkup Bayappadavendiyadhaayirukkum, Ellaarum Yovaanai Meyyaagath Theerkkathdharisi Endru Ennugiraargale Endru Thangalukkulle Aalosanaipanni,
33 yesuvukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Engalukkuth Theriyaadhu Endraargal. Appozhudhu, Yesu: Naanum Inna Adhigaaraththinaale Ivaigalai Seygiren Endru Ungalukku Sollen Endraar.
